menu.thosedaychangemenu: You can change the menu on these days
menu.alreadyPreparing: Meals for today are already being prepared. Orders or changes for tomorrow — until 11:00 today. No restrictions for other days.
menu.confirmDelete: Confirm order deletion. When placing a new order, all dishes must be selected again
menu.chooseatleastonedish: Please choose dishes for all categories
menu.closeapp: Close the app and open it again.

delivery.recyclingText: You can give plastic containers for recycling to our courier. The containers must be washed and free of food residues.
delivery.deliverywithoutmeetText: The courier will leave the order at your door. Please ensure that it is convenient for you to pick it up at the specified time.

faq.processa: You can use your delivery days at any convenient time — they don’t need to be consecutive.
faq.subscriptiona: If you want to extend your current program (e.g., 1100 kcal), simply choose the same calorie plan and number of days — we’ll add them to your current program.
faq.newa: If you want to try a different meal plan (e.g., 1400 kcal), you can try a new program. It won’t replace the current one — you’ll be able to use both and choose the one you need when placing an order.
faq.controla: You’ll always see how many days are left in each program and easily manage your deliveries.
faq.createa: An order is created after selecting dishes in all 5 categories, filling in the delivery address (by default, the address from registration is used), and selecting the program (if there’s only one — it will be auto-selected).
faq.edita: You can edit the order at any time unless it’s already being prepared (for today) or for the next day after 11:00 AM. You can change selected dishes and delivery address.
faq.deletea: You can delete an order at any time unless it’s already being prepared (for today) or for the next day after 11:00 AM. A deleted order will be considered unused until a new one is placed.

mainpass.accountdeleteprov: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
mainpass.questionsupport: For any questions, you can contact Guest Support by sending a message below
mainpass.agree: Your personal data will be processed in accordance with the Privacy Policy.
